name: Feref
description:
We're a creative agency for a connected world. Made in Soho. Fiercely independent since 1968.
For over 40 years, Feref has created some of the worldâ€™s best-loved advertising and PR launches for movies like Star Wars, Mission Impossible, James Bond, Frozen and Marvel's Avengers.
